title: vishvanAthEna rakSitOhamr
sahitya:
vishvanAthEna rakSitOham vishAlAkSi samEtEna 


anupallavi

  shAshvata guruguha sampUjitEna sAmanta puSpa mAlAdharENa
(madhyamakala)
vishvOtpatti sthitilaya kAraNena gartta tIra prabhAvEna 


caraNam    kAshI kSetra sthita prasiddhEna vasiSThAdi munigaNa sannutEna
vikalpa rOga vaidya nipuNEna vimala gaNikA nartana priyEna
(madhyamakAla)
Ashrita jana mandArENa dEvAdi nuta pada pankajEna
sangIta shAstrAdi samyuktEna samasta sAmrAjya prada shivEna
